title: Data race when accessing dirties map in hashdb.Database.commit
body:
#### System information

Commit hash: c8a22020287e0260e2310a1b91a1aa9b795ca445  (current master)

#### Issue description

In `trie/triedb/hashdb.Database.commit` a key is read from dirites map without locking db lock, while `trie/tiredb/hashdb.Database.dereference` may modify the map concurrently resulting in `concurrent map read and map write` panic.

#### Possible scenario affected by the issue

One scenario affected by the race is when a new block state is committed and concurrently an rpc is called (e.g. `debug_traceBlockByNumber`) which executes `eth.StateAtBlock` querying a state that is available in live database and then executes `tracers.StateReleaseFunc` which dereferences a node.

#### Code pointers

* Read access to `dirties` map:
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/c8a22020287e0260e2310a1b91a1aa9b795ca445/trie/triedb/hashdb/database.go#L479-L484

* Write access to `dirties` map:
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/c8a22020287e0260e2310a1b91a1aa9b795ca445/trie/triedb/hashdb/database.go#L337

* Example of place where `dereference` is called in rpc handling goroutine:

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/c8a22020287e0260e2310a1b91a1aa9b795ca445/eth/tracers/api.go#L569-L586

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/c8a22020287e0260e2310a1b91a1aa9b795ca445/eth/api_backend.go#L411-L412

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/c8a22020287e0260e2310a1b91a1aa9b795ca445/eth/state_accessor.go#L211-L214

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/c8a22020287e0260e2310a1b91a1aa9b795ca445/eth/state_accessor.go#L50-L60

* Example of place where `commit` is called in another goroutine:
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/c8a22020287e0260e2310a1b91a1aa9b795ca445/core/blockchain.go#L1457-L1457

#### Proposed solution

Lock db lock when accessing `dirties` map in `hashdb.Database.commit`.
